title: RateMyApp Control for universal windows platform
body: Include a RateMyApp for UWP control similar to RateMyApp control released by Nokia for Windows Phone 8. This make it easy to implement and obtain rating.Saves time and can focus on app logic as opposed to mundane tasks.

comments.body: I've ported the control to UWP. see my github https://github.com/EdiWang/UWP-RateMyApp
